attributes.action: Not to take any decisions on reducing our current military capabilities.
attributes.additional_details: We need action to build our military now not in years to come as the threat is current.
attributes.background: I believe that the general public do not want to see any further degradation of our military capacity. In fact I believe that we should be spending more on our armed forces to support them and to deter any more Russian aggression towards the United Kingdom and Europe.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We are unsure of what exactly you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government has committed to increasing UK defence spending to 2.5% of the UK's GDP: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/pm-says-step-up-in-defence-spending-can-safeguard-the-future-of-nato# 

You could start a petition about specific examples of current proposals for reductions in the UK’s military capacity.
